Package org.robolectric.shadows

Class ShadowRoleManager

java.lang.Object
org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowRoleManager
@Implements(value=android.app.role.RoleManager.class, minSdk=29) public class ShadowRoleManager extends Object
A shadow implementation of RoleManager.

    • __constructor__

      @Implementation(maxSdk=30) protected void __constructor__(Context context)

    • __constructor__

      @Implementation(minSdk=31) protected void __constructor__(Context context, IRoleManager service)

    • addRoleHolder

      public static void addRoleHolder(@Nonnull String roleName, @Nonnull String roleHolder, @Nonnull UserHandle user)
      Add a role that would be held by the given roleHolder app for the specified user.

      This method makes the role available as well.

    • removeRoleHolder

      public static void removeRoleHolder(@Nonnull String roleName, @Nonnull String roleHolder, @Nonnull UserHandle user)
      Remove a role that would be held by the given roleHolder app for the specified user.

      This method makes the role unavailable if no other role holders remain.

    • addHeldRole

      @Deprecated public void addHeldRole(@Nonnull String roleName)
      Deprecated.
      - Please use addRoleHolder(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, android.os.UserHandle)
      Add a role that would be held by the calling app when invoking RoleManager.isRoleHeld(String).

      This method makes the role available as well.

    • removeHeldRole

      @Deprecated public void removeHeldRole(@Nonnull String roleName)
      Deprecated.
      - Please use removeRoleHolder(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, android.os.UserHandle)
      Remove a role previously added via addRoleHolder(String, String, UserHandle).

    • addAvailableRole

      @Deprecated public void addAvailableRole(@Nonnull String roleName)
      Deprecated.
      - Please use addRoleHolder(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, android.os.UserHandle)
      Add a role that will be recognized as available when invoking RoleManager.isRoleAvailable(String).

    • removeAvailableRole

      @Deprecated public void removeAvailableRole(@Nonnull String roleName)
      Deprecated.
      - Please use removeRoleHolder(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, android.os.UserHandle)
      Remove a role previously added via addRoleHolder(String, String, UserHandle).
